items.title: Add nixos-needsreboot to NixOS

items.content_html:
Description of changes

Fixes #317544.

Leaving in draft - Might need a wantedBy addition. I had to manually start it.

Seems to work. Things that were disabled before are enabled, though it still doesn't detect my mobile gpu fan speed.

Someone else can finish this if they want to test/fix wantedBy before I get to it.

items.title: nixos/nvidia: minor cleanups

items.content_html:
Description of changes

This PR moves the existing Prometheus test to just being a Thanos test, whilst adding more test cases specific to Prometheus itself:

  • Alertmanager
  • Federation
  • Pushgateway
  • Remote write

Also adds a alertmanager-webhook-logger package+module so that the Alertmanager test can be end-to-end.

$ nixos-option --flake /etc/nixos

Fixes #97855

items.title: nixos/pixivfe: init

items.content_html:
Description of changes

I've noticed some that some values are not set using mkDefault, especially in case where values differ between the different parts of netbird. This happens for example when only using the nginx for the dashboard while the rest is using another host as a reverse proxy.
Another thing that is kinda suboptimal is the Stun and Turn config. Since they are using lists, they may not merge as expected, meaning they don't merge at all currenly. I've not yet found a way how to make this both easy to setup, with good defaults, while also allowing changes, without having to redefine the whole list.
Lastly, I put acme in a mkIf since otherwise the attrset will be empty but exist, which fails some assertions in the acme module.

I've added myself as a maintainer since I plan to keep using this module and would like to help keep it updated, but I'm not hard on that if you want to skip the hassle of multiple maintainers, that's fine by me.

Things done

  • Tested compilation of all packages that depend on this change using nix-shell -p nixpkgs-review --run "nixpkgs-review rev HEAD". Note: all changes have to be committed, also see nixpkgs-review usage
  • Tested basic functionality of all binary files (usually in ./result/bin/)
  • 24.11 Release Notes (or backporting 23.11 and 24.05 Release notes)
    • (Package updates) Added a release notes entry if the change is major or breaking
    • (Module updates) Added a release notes entry if the change is significant
    • (Module addition) Added a release notes entry if adding a new NixOS module
  • Fits CONTRIBUTING.md.
